hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT paym.t_iApplicationKind || 0 || paym.t_ApplicationKey || paym.t_AttrID AS operationId, paym.t_RecivFIO AS counteragent, REPLACE( rsb_struct.getString('t_Accnt',T_FMTBLOBDATA_XXXX,0), CHR(0), '' ) AS receiverAccount, REPLACE( rsb_struct.getString('t_Bank' ,T_FMTBLOBDATA_XXXX,0), CHR(0), '' ) AS receiverBank, REPLACE( rsb_struct.getString('t_BIC' ,T_FMTBLOBDATA_XXXX,0), CHR(0), '' ) AS receiverBIC
FROM dsbdepdoc_dbt opers LEFT JOIN drt_paym_dbt paym ON paym.t_ApplicationKey=opers.t_ApplicationKey And paym.t_iApplicationKind=opers.t_iApplicationKind AND paym.t_AttrID = 'пейб_онк' WHERE opers.t_Referenc = :id AND opers.t_Date_Document = :date AND opers.t_NumDayDoc = :dayNumber
